DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety phenylephrine hydrochloride 10 mg + acetaminophen 500 mg + dimethindene maleate 1 mg compare phenylephrine hydrocloride 10 mg alone healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Phenylephrine Hydrochloride , Acetaminophen , Dimethindene Maleate Compared Phenylephrine Hydrochloride Alone Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy volunteer 18 50 year ; Clinical examination without abnormal finding Ability understand nature purpose study , include risk adverse effect Any cardiovascular disease , coronary artery disease , circulation problem history stroke , peripheral vascular disease arrhythmia History serious adverse reaction hypersensitivity drug Hypersensitivity drug study drug chemically relate compound
